scripts.delete:testOutputs: npm run delete:results && npm run delete:report
scripts.cypress-login-pack: npm run delete:testOutputs && npm run cy:login && npm run merge_generate:reports
scripts.cypress-sanity-pack: npm run delete:testOutputs && npm run cy:sanity && npm run merge_generate:reports
scripts.test: npm run clean: reports && cypress run
scripts.merge_generate:reports: npx mochawesome-merge cypress/results/mochawesome/*.json > cypress/results/index.json && npx marge cypress/results/index.json --reportDir public --assetsDir public/assets --reportPageTitle index.html
